btrfs-sxbackup-purge
====================

Synopsis
--------------

.. autoprogram:: btrfs_sxbackup.cli:parser
    :maxdepth: 1
    :start_command: purge
    :prog: btrfs-sxbackup

Description
-----------

Purge backups according to retention expressions.
o

See also
--------

:manpage:`btrfs-sxbackup(1)`
